Replying to @fbnlsr 2018-02-13 15:39
@fbnlsr @Netlify Hmm. I get a pretty snappy result here in the UK. A quick look at load speeds (uncached) looks good in my browser, and the response times from around the world look pretty good. Are you certain that your measurements do not include the time for the first hit on a deployment? https://t.co/sLwwaNavo0
  • Permalink
  • Twitter
Replying to @fbnlsr 2018-02-13 15:08
@fbnlsr @Netlify No. The first (ever) request for any resource will take a little longer as it goes to the origin server and then primes the cache in the CDN... but I'd not expect response times like that. Able to share details of your measurements with Support?
